testcase.classname: Add to Cart and Checkout Flow
testcase.name: User adds two products to the cart and completes the checkout process - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed When the user adds two products to the cart.................................passed And the user proceeds to the checkout page..................................passed And the user fills in checkout information with "Nandini", "VK", and "679303".passed And the user confirms the checkout..........................................passed Then the user should see the "Checkout: Complete!" page.....................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid/invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then "The user should be redirected to the inventory page"..................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid/invalid credentials - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "problem_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then "The user should be redirected to the inventory page"..................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid/invalid credentials - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "performance_glitch_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then "The user should be redirected to the inventory page"..................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid/invalid credentials - Example #1.4
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "abcd".....passed Then "Error message should be displayed"....................................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid/invalid credentials - Example #1.5
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "invalid_username" and password "invalid_pass".passed Then "Error message should be displayed"....................................passed

testcase.name: Login with empty credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with empty credentials................................passed Then The error message "Epic sadface: Username is required" should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: checks products lists - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then User lands on the product listing page.................................passed And list of products is visible.............................................passed

testcase.name: checks product sorting - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the SauceDemo login page...............................passed When The user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed And user check that sorting by Price (low to high)..........................passed Then sorts the items correctly..............................................passed
